column5: What has to be done to bring fish back over the border while travelling by plane into chicago. Thanks.
No one has ever brought fish back?
Freeze it, pack it in dry ice and check it in.
You can check it without any problems. Just make sure to tell them you have dry ice in the cooler.

There is usually no problem, it will inspected like all to the rest of your baggage. Yes, be sure to let them know what it is ahead of time, and it is perishable if lost. You may also want to check with your airline(s) ahead of time, since some have started charging extra for more than one piece of baggage or carry-on item. Chuck
